alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Jones; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 06 at 1:08PM MST until November 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST MONDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 6 PM CST Monday. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Jones, Lyman and Buffalo. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph today. East 15 to 25 with gusts up to 40 mph Monday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds, low humidity and cured fuels will result in critical fire weather conditions. Any fires that begin may spread quickly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
